text: Ines Torelli (née Ines Stierli, June 14, 1931 – August 23, 2019) was a Swiss comedian, radio personality, singer and actress. She was born in St. Gallen, Canton of St. Gallen, Switzerland. She was known for her roles in the television series Fascht e Familie and in the 1961 movie Chikita. Torelli died on August 23, 2019 at her home in Rose Bay, Nova Scotia, Canada at the age of 88. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Swiss stage actors Category:Swiss movie actors Category:Radio actors Category:Swiss television actors Category:Voice actors Category:Swiss singers Category:Comedians Category:Radio personalities Category:People from St. Gallen
title: Ines Torelli
